item.description:
PLEASE ATTEND THIS INFO MEETING AS WE WILL BE SETTING SCHEDULES AND CONTRACTS AND GIVING YOU ALL THE OVERVIEW OF THE VOLUNTEER POSITION

 

 

ITS NOT ONLY FREE BUT WILL HELP US FUND THE LOAVES AND FISHES MEAL PROGRAM BY WORKING AT GILLETTE STADIUM AS OUR VOLUNTEER. ANY VOLUNTEER WHO IS REGULAR AND COMPLETES REQUIRED NUMBER OF EVENTS WILL RECIEVE TICKETS TO OUR YEAR END PARTY AND DINNER PLUS AN OVER NIGHT ROOM AT THE BOSTON PARK PLAZA HOTEL A FIVE HUNDRED DOLLAR VALUE

ANY EXTRA VOLUNTEER WILL RECIEVE TICKETS TO THE PARTY AT THE PARK PLAZA WHICH IS A 200 VALUE.

SO HELP US HELP YOU GET TO BOSTON BEST PARTY OF THE YEAR THE CWCAO LOAVES AND FISHES VOLUNTEER AWARDS PARTY

WE ARE RECRUITING CONCESSION VOLUNTEERS WHO WISH TO BE EXTRA'S OR REGULARS

REGULAR VOLUNTEER STAFF MUST COMMIT TO TWELVE GAMES THIS SEASON WHILE FILL IN OR EXTRA VOLUNTEERS WILL COME TO THE STADIUM ON AN AS NEEDED BASIS . ALL EXTRAS ARE REQUIRED TO DO SIX EVENTS THIS YEAR

TRAINING STARTS SOON PLEASE RSVP THIS EVENT AND WE WILL CONTACT YOU

The Boston Volunteers
Big enough to deliver, small enough to care
Learn more: www.BostonVolunteer.org

group.name: Boston Volunteers. Big enough 2 deliver, small enough 2 care

item.name: Help a Womens organization with its Concession Stand at Gillette Events
